description.narrative: INSO Somalia provides registered NGOs with safety and security services that improve their situational awareness, provide an evidence base for operational practice and support safe humanitarian access. Services include round the clock alerts and information, analysis, incident mapping, crises assistance, coordination meetings and a comprehensive portfolio of training and capacity building services. INSO Somalia has been serving NGOs since 2015 with field offices in Hargeisa, Mogadishu and Garowe and an analysis office in Nairobi. This year it will integrate the bordering Kenyan counties of Mandera, Garissa, Wajir and Lamu in pursuit of a more comprehensive regional approach.
